comments:
I created a module that had a dependancy on another module. After deleting the
dependant module manually from the resource navigator and continuing to use WTP,
several internal errors occurred in different parts of the product. I managed to
catch two of them below - one during validation and the other in the component
builder. It looks like the module code needs some hardening when modules don't
exist or go missing. Normally I would mark this as major given the number of
exceptions, the fact that the errors happen on every build, and the bad user
experience, but given how close 0.7 is I'll leave this as 'normal' for now.

I think fixes went in on Friday the 22nd to catch most of the more common errors.
Reducing priority, and deferring to M8
This should go away once the "Refactoring" actions are implememted
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 91967 ***
